original_text: It came to pass after this also, that the children of Moab, and the children of Ammon, and with them other beside the Ammonites, came against Jehoshaphat to battle.
korean_text: 그 후에 모압 자손과 암몬 자손들이 마온 사람들과 함께 와서 여호사밧을 치고자 한지라

sentences.original_text: It came to pass after this also,
and with them other beside the Ammonites,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들과 함께 암몬 사람 외 다른 자들이
